participant_1.background:
My favorites things are the ones that I share with my mom.
i am twenty five years old.
I enjoy spending time with my nieces and nephews, helping them get fit and have fun at the same time.
I listen to the music of my youth to feel like a kid again.
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.

I like to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail
I love 3d modelling in my spare time.
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.

content.text: Hey there, hope you're doing well!
Hello! I am doing great, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well too, thank you! I'm from the midwest, where are you from?
I am from a small town in the Midwest as well! I love how quiet and relaxed life is here.
I agree, it's so much more peaceful than the big city. I enjoy spending time outside, do you have any hobbies?
I love to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail. We like to go hiking, biking, and camping together. I also love to 3D model in my spare time.
That's awesome! I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it. I love listening to music from my youth, do you have a favorite artist?
I love listening to music from the 90s and early 2000s. My favorite artist is probably No Doubt.
I love No Doubt! Gwen Stefani is an amazing artist. I also love listening to music from the 90s, my favorite artist is probably Nirvana.
Nirvana is great! I love their music. I'm glad we have similar music tastes.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same music as you.
